content: [phase1.1] Setup project structure, requirements.txt, .gitignore, config files
[phase1.2] Build design_system.py with Polymarket colors and constants
[phase1.2] Build auth.py with session-based access gate
[phase1.2] Build components.py with reusable UI components
[phase1.3] Create curated data files (mock_trends.json, attraction_research.json, social_skills.json)
[phase1.7] Build main app.py with tab navigation and integration
[phase1.8] Create start.sh script and test locally
